SEARCH
Package org.rcmd.jneuroformats

Class FsCurv

java.lang.Object
org.rcmd.jneuroformats.FsCurv
public class FsCurv extends Object
Class representing a FreeSurfer curv file, or a CSV file with per-vertex data for a surface (mesh)

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    List<Float>

    The per-vertex data, one value per vertex.
    Integer

    Metadata, The number of faces in the surface this data belongs to.

      public List<Float> data
      The per-vertex data, one value per vertex.

    • numberOfFaces

      public Integer numberOfFaces
      Metadata, The number of faces in the surface this data belongs to. Typically not relevant, set to 0 if unknown.

    • FsCurv

      public FsCurv()
      Default constructor for FsCurv. Initializes an empty list for the data.

  • Method Details

    • fromCsvFile

      protected static FsCurv fromCsvFile(Path filePath, Boolean has_header) throws IOException
      Read a file in CSV format and return an FsCurv object. The file can have one of two formats: either one value per line, or two values per line, separated by a comma. In the latter case, the first value is ignored.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.txt")`.
      has_header - whether the file has a header row at the top.
      Returns:
      an FsCurv object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.

    • read

      public static FsCurv read(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Read a file in FreeSurfer curv or CSV format and return an FsCurv object. The file format is determined by the file extension. If the file extension is ".csv", the file is read as CSV, otherwise as FreeSurfer curv.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.txt")`. For csv files, the file can have one of two formats: either one value per line, or two values per line (index and per-vertex value), separated by a comma. In the latter case, the first value (index) is ignored.
      Returns:
      an FsCurv object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.

    • fromFsCurvFile

      protected static FsCurv fromFsCurvFile(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Read a file in FreeSurfer curv format and return an FsCurv object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.txt")`.
      Returns:
      an FsCurv object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.

    • toCsvFormat

      public String toCsvFormat(Boolean with_header, Boolean with_index)
      Generate string representation of this mesh in CSV format.
      Parameters:
      with_header - whether to include a header row at the top of the CSV.
      with_index - whether to include a vertex index column.
      Returns:
      the CSV format string

    • write

      public void write(Path filePath, String format) throws IOException
      Write this FsCurv to a file in curv or CSV format.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to write to
      format - the format to write to, either "curv" or "csv".
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
